description:
The Yuma Sun app is a must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all the Yuma area has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with the official companion to the Yuma Sun daily print newspaper for Yuma, Wellton, Somerton and San Luis, Ariz. Get high-quality news around the clock from our trusted writers. Access local news stories, military stories, plus sports, entertainment, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our App spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter.
The Yuma Sun app is an ad-supported application.
